bossDialog: (At first appearing as a lump on the floor, the Leech bolts upright as you approach, waving its heads around and making repulsive sounds. It lumbers towards you and attacks!)
(The strange creature flops around almost comedically, trying to get to you. It's a good thing you know how dangerous Leeches are, lest you be caught off guard.)
(You hear a disgusting slurping noise as the Leech raises up, a now-desiccated corpse falling from one of its mouths. It clearly intends to make you its next meal!)

cardBonuses.4: When your creatures recover {STAT_health} from {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH}, the amount of healing has a 25% chance to be doubled.

master.dialog: Anyone who's anyone will admit that Leeches are some of the most disgusting creatures on the planet, but I'll be damned if they don't make for fantastic combatants on the battlefield. It's time for my Leeches to suck your creatures dry!
master.name: Vesh

name: Leech
